Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.screens

Class BoardScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
      • view.screens.BoardScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIBoardScreen, GUIBoard
    public abstract class BoardScreen
extends Screen
    Logic view of the Board. Contains all data structures useful to board display This class should be extended from all concrete view board screens

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardScreen

        public BoardScreen​(ViewManager view,
                   java.lang.String activePlayer,
                   java.util.List<Player> players,
                   java.util.List<Coordinate> preHighCoords)
        Create the Board Screen
        Parameters:
        view - A reference to the view manger
        activePlayer - The username of the first player that should make a "move"
        players - List of all players in game
        preHighCoords - List of all coordinates to highlight when the screen is built

    • Method Detail

      • selectSquare

        protected final void selectSquare​(Coordinate square)
                           throws IllegalValueException,
                                  IllegalActionException
        This method has to be called every time a square is selected from the player. If the square is a valid selection the view logic. If the square selected is a valid selection for builder placement a PlaceBuilderMessage will be sent to the server. If the square selected is valid for a move either FirstActionMessage or SelectCoordinateMessage will be sent to the server
        Parameters:
        square - The coordinate of the square selected
        Throws:
        IllegalValueException - The coordinate is outside of the board
        IllegalActionException - The square selection is not valid (square is not a builder or highlighted)

      • resetPhase

        protected final void resetPhase()
                         throws IllegalActionException
        Reverts all moves done but not already sent to the server (for example a builder selection)
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - The action is not allowed

      • toggleSpecialPower

        protected final void toggleSpecialPower()
                                 throws IllegalActionException
        Toggle special power moves, if they are available
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - Special power is not allowed

      • endPhase

        protected final void endPhase()
                       throws IllegalActionException
        Ends an optional action phase
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - The phase is not optional and could not be skipped

      • getBuilder

        protected final Builder getBuilder​(java.lang.String playerName,
                                   int id,
                                   boolean old)
        Get a specific builder object in the board
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player controlling the builder
        id - Tbe id of the builder
        old - Selector of the list of builder (old builders or new builder)
        Returns:
        If old is true the builder of the past board status will be returned, if old is false the current state of the builder will be returned

      • getSelectedBuilder

        protected final Builder getSelectedBuilder()
        Getter for the builder that is actually selected from the player. Could be null if no player is selected
        Returns:
        Currently selected builder
